title: Early Round Mid Blue To B Orange Recon Bolt
description: This is useful for quickly scanning players in B Orange at the beginning of the round.

title: A Nest to A Site Shock Dart
description: This is a good shock dart combo to kill enemies on the boxes on A Site.

title: Mid Blue to Mid Boiler Recon Bolt
description: This is a good recon bolt to see enemies in Mid Boiler.

title: Early A Site And A Nest Recon Bolt
description: This recon bolt is a great way to get some early information as to where the defending side players are set up on A Site.

title: Default Early Mid Info Dart From Pallet
description: Here's a fast dart lineup you can use to support teammates looking for engagements at Mid, or to mix it up.
